name: Sci Fi Shooter
description:
Made as the final game of the Udemy Unreal course I have been working through in my spare time.  A third person sci-fi shooter using free assets from Unreal's cancelled Wraith game. 

During this module of the course I was able to further cement my C++ coding knowledge, especially within the Unreal engine. This game also taught me a great deal about industry standard practices with regards to animations, blend spaces, collision detection, AI pathing, behaviour trees, ray tracing and state machines.

How to Play

Standard shooter controls for keyboard or gamepad. Navigate the level and eliminate all hostiles to win.
